com.example.unlibrary.book_list

Class BooksRecyclerViewAdapter.BookViewHolder

  • java.lang.Object
    • androidx.recyclerview.widget.RecyclerView.ViewHolder
      • com.example.unlibrary.book_list.BooksRecyclerViewAdapter.BookViewHolder
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.view.View.OnClickListener
    Enclosing class:
    BooksRecyclerViewAdapter

    public class BooksRecyclerViewAdapter.BookViewHolder
extends androidx.recyclerview.widget.RecyclerView.ViewHolder
implements android.view.View.OnClickListener
    ViewHolder for the book list recycler view. Contains a book card. Handles on click interactions. Defined inline as a closure and non-generically because it is already assuming that it will be binding to a book.

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class androidx.recyclerview.widget.RecyclerView.ViewHolder
